hanzi-su-wiki:
輩

Значения

Товарищи, собратья; шайка

Мнемоника

Шайка, сформированная из людей низшего сословия, обслуживающих места казни четвертованием 車 до уничтожения 非.

Варианты

辈

heisig_chinese_memo: Some man jailed in Russia for a lifetime, is freed by his comrade who crashes into the jail cell with a vehicle.
heisig_constituent: comrade, un-, jail cell, prison bars, car
koohiiStory1: Some man jailed in Russia, is freed by his comrade (from the Communist party perhaps), who crashes into the jail cell with a vehicle.
koohiiStory2: (+fuaburisu) But it´s the wrong jail cell! Your comrade is one floor above.
kunYomi: ともがら、 -ばら、 やかい、 やから
jp_example_words:
後輩(こうはい): junior (at work or school)
先輩(せんぱい): one´s senior
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The criminal that stole your car was your comrade! You thought the two of you were friends, but you were probably wrong.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Just because someone is your comrade doesn't mean they actually like you. Don't let your guard down and let them near your car.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You feel really weird about this whole situation so you write your comrade a haiku (はい). It's really all you can do, since your car is long gone.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Comrade, what the heck
I want to get my car back
I thought we were friends.
Ru_trainchinese: bèi: (сущ) поколение; (книжн.) тип (людей); жизнь, время жизни
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you mistake (非) the car (車) for your colleague's
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After receiving manslaughter charges for a drunk driving car accident the man has to spend a lifetime in a jail cell.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " car " and " non ", the original meaning is a hundred cars, and it also refers to cars in different ranks. "Shuowen": "If the army departs, one hundred taels are one generation. From the car, the non-sound." "The Six Books of the Ancients-Fortification III": "The generation, the cars are divided into generations."

" Generation " can mean the same kind. "Historical Records: The Biography of Sun Tzu Wu Qi": "The grandson sees that his horses are not far apart. Horses have upper, middle and lower generations."

" Generation " also means seniority. Han Kong Rong "On the Book of Sheng Xiaozhang": "Today's youth, like to slander the predecessors."

" Generation " also means comparison. "Preface to the Official Biography of the Later Han Dynasty": "Bian Feng and Yan Du were successively Jing Zhaoyin, and people at that time referred to their predecessors as Zhao Zhang." Li Xian's note: "Generation, class. Zhao refers to Zhao Guanghan and Zhang refers to Zhang Chang. "

" Generation " is also used as a quantifier. In ancient times, sixty riders were a generation. "Six Taoist ‧ All Soldiers": "Thirty horses are a tun, and 60 horses are a generation." It also means " one ". "Xue Yuanshang Biography": "Yuan rewards to the mansion for three days, receive There is less evil, more than 30 generations of rods die, Chen Zhushi." It also means " group ", "Historical Records-Zhang Er Chen Yu Biography": "The messenger will go to more than ten generations and die, how can he win the king?" " Times ", "Historical Records: Bai Qi Wang Jian Biography": "Wang Jian is the key, the envoy also invited the five generations of good fields." Sima Zhensuoyin: "It is said that the envoy will please five times." It also means " ship ", Tang Lu Guimeng "Poems of Fenghe Attacking the Taihu Lake-Liandu": "A million warships, more than 30 floating palaces." It also means " head ", Song Huang Tingjian "Xie He Thirteen Send Crabs": "The cold cats restrain the 16 generations, I have felt that autumn is prospering." It can also mean "a piece. " Ming Song Lian "You Zhongshan": "Return to the west, enter the stele pavilion, and the stele will be many generations."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " car " and " non ", the original meaning is a hundred cars, which also refers to cars in different ranks.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「非」聲，本義為車百輛，亦指分行列的車。《說文》：「若軍發車，百兩爲一輩。从車，非聲。」《六書故‧工事三》：「輩，車以列分為輩。」

　　「輩」可表示同類。《史記‧孫子吳起列傳》：「孫子見其馬足不甚相遠，馬有上、中、下輩。」

　　「輩」也表示輩份。漢孔融〈論盛孝章書〉：「今之少年，喜謗前輩。」

　　「輩」還表示相比。《後漢書‧循吏傳序》：「邊鳳、延篤先後為京兆尹，時人以輩前世趙張。」李賢注：「輩，類也。趙謂趙廣漢，張謂張敞。」

　　「輩」還用作量詞，古代六十騎為一輩。《六韜‧均兵》：「三十騎為一屯，六十騎為一輩。」也表示「個」，《新唐書‧薛元賞傳》：「元賞到府三日，收惡少，杖死三十餘輩，陳諸市。」還表示「群」，《史記‧張耳陳餘列傳》：「使者往十餘輩，輒死，若何以能得王？」還表示「次」，《史記‧白起王翦列傳》：「王翦既至關，使使還請善田者五輩。」司馬貞索隱：「謂使者五度請也。」亦表示「艘」，唐陸龜蒙《奉和襲美太湖詩‧練瀆》：「戰艦百萬輩，浮宮三十餘。」還表示「頭」，宋黃庭堅〈謝何十三送蟹〉：「寒蒲束縛十六輩，已覺秋興生江山。」亦能表示「塊」，明宋濂〈游鍾山記〉：「復折而西，入碑亭，碑凡數輩。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「非」聲，本義為車百輛，亦指分行列的車。

①家族的世代，泛指人際的一種先後次第：輩分。先輩。長(zhǎng)輩。後輩。晚輩。前輩。
②等，類(指人)：吾輩。爾輩。輩出。無能之輩。
③人活着的時間，畢生：我這一輩子。
④車百輛，亦指分行列的車。

後輩(こうはい): junior (at work or school)
先輩(せんぱい): one´s senior

從「 車 」，「 非 」聲，本義為車百輛，亦指分行列的車。《說文》：「若軍發車，百兩爲一輩。从車，非聲。」《六書故‧工事三》：「輩，車以列分為輩。」 「 輩 」可表示同類。《史記‧孫子吳起列傳》：「孫子見其馬足不甚相遠，馬有上、中、下輩。」 「 輩 」也表示輩份。漢孔融〈論盛孝章書〉：「今之少年，喜謗前輩。」 「 輩 」還表示相比。《後漢書‧循吏傳序》：「邊鳳、延篤先後為京兆尹，時人以輩前世趙張。」李賢注：「輩，類也。趙謂趙廣漢，張謂張敞。」 「 輩 」還用作量詞，古代六十騎為一輩。《六韜‧均兵》：「三十騎為一屯，六十騎為一輩。」也表示「 個 」，《新唐書‧薛元賞傳》：「元賞到府三日，收惡少，杖死三十餘輩，陳諸市。」還表示「 群 」，《史記‧張耳陳餘列傳》：「使者往十餘輩，輒死，若何以能得王？」還表示「 次 」，《史記‧白起王翦列傳》：「王翦既至關，使使還請善田者五輩。」司馬貞索隱：「謂使者五度請也。」亦表示「 艘 」，唐陸龜蒙《奉和襲美太湖詩‧練瀆》：「戰艦百萬輩，浮宮三十餘。」還表示「 頭 」，宋黃庭堅〈謝何十三送蟹〉：「寒蒲束縛十六輩，已覺秋興生江山。」亦能表示「 塊 」，明宋濂〈游鍾山記〉：「復折而西，入碑亭，碑凡數輩。」
From the sound of " car" and " non", the original meaning is a hundred cars, and it also refers to cars in different ranks. "Shuowen": "If the army departs, one hundred taels are one generation. From the car, the non-sound." "The Six Books of the Ancients-Fortification III": "The generation, the cars are divided into generations." " Generation" can mean the same kind. "Historical Records: The Biography of Sun Tzu Wu Qi": "The grandson sees that his horses are not far apart. Horses have upper, middle and lower generations." " Generation" also means seniority. Han Kong Rong "On the Book of Sheng Xiaozhang": "Today's youth, like to slander the predecessors." " Generation" also means comparison. "Preface to the Official Biography of the Later Han Dynasty": "Bian Feng and Yan Du were successively Jing Zhaoyin, and people at that time referred to their predecessors as Zhao Zhang." Li Xian's note: "Generation, class. Zhao refers to Zhao Guanghan and Zhang refers to Zhang Chang. " " Generation" is also used as a quantifier. In ancient times, sixty riders were a generation. "Six Taoist ‧ All Soldiers": "Thirty horses are a tun, and 60 horses are a generation." It also means " one". "Xue Yuanshang Biography": "Yuan rewards to the mansion for three days, receive There is less evil, more than 30 generations of rods die, Chen Zhushi." It also means " group", "Historical Records-Zhang Er Chen Yu Biography": "The messenger will go to more than ten generations and die, how can he win the king?" " Times", "Historical Records: Bai Qi Wang Jian Biography": "Wang Jian is the key, the envoy also invited the five generations of good fields." Sima Zhensuoyin: "It is said that the envoy will please five times." It also means " ship", Tang Lu Guimeng "Poems of Fenghe Attacking the Taihu Lake-Liandu": "A million warships, more than 30 floating palaces." It also means " head", Song Huang Tingjian "Xie He Thirteen Send Crabs": "The cold cats restrain the 16 generations, I have felt that autumn is prospering." It can also mean "a piece." Ming Song Lian "You Zhongshan": "Return to the west, enter the stele pavilion, and the stele will be many generations."

輩字的基本解释

輩
bèi
见“辈”。

輩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》補妹切，去隊，幫。］
“辈1”的繁体字。亦作“軰1”。
(1)车百辆。亦指分行列的车。
(2)同一类群的人、事、物。
(3)行辈；辈分。
(4)比并，比类。
(5)代；世代。
(6)量词。古代六十骑为一辈。
(7)量词。个。多指人。
(8)量词。批；群。
(9)量词。度；次。
(10)量词。艘。
(11)量词。头；只。
(12)量词。块。

輩字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輩； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第19
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】補妹切【正韻】邦妹切，?音背。【說文】軍發車百兩爲一輩。【六書故】車以列分爲輩。　又【玉篇】類也。【正韻】等也。【史記·婁敬傳】使者十輩來。【後漢·王霸傳】令郡國孝子、悌弟、貞婦爲一輩。　又【玉篇】比也。【正韻】班也。【後漢·循吏傳】邊鳳、延篤先後爲京兆尹，時人以輩前世趙、張。【吳志·張溫傳】當今無輩。　又【正韻】行也。【論語註】先進、後進，猶言前輩、後輩。　俗省作軰。

輩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輩字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
generation

generation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Guangyun" make up the girl, go to the team, help. ]
Traditional characters for "generation 1". Also known as "軰1".
(1) One hundred vehicles. Also refers to the cars in the branch.
(2) People, things and things in the same group.
(3) Senior; seniority.
(4) Comparing and comparing.
(5) Generations; generations.
(6) Quantifiers. Sixty riders were a generation in ancient times.
(7) Quantifiers. A. Multi-finger.
(8) Quantifiers. Batch; group.
(9) Quantifiers. Degrees; times.
(10) Quantifiers. Ship.
(11) Quantifiers. Head; only.
(12) Quantifiers. Piece.
generation
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　 Generation; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Make up girl cut [zheng rhyme] Bang girl cut, sound back. [Said the text] The army starts a hundred taels as one generation. [Six Book History] Cars are divided into generations.　[Jade articles] Class also. [Zheng Yun] Wait too. [Historical Records·Lou Jing Biography] Ten generations of messengers come. [Later Han·Wang Ba Biography] Make the filial sons, younger brothers, and virgins of the county into one generation.　[Jade articles] Biye again. [Zheng Yun] Class also. [Later Han·Xunli Biography] Bian Feng and Yan Du were Jing Zhaoyin successively, and they were Zhao and Zhang in their predecessors. [Wu Zhi·Zhang Wen Biography] There is no generation today.　[Zheng Yun] It's OK. [The Analects of Confucius] Advanced and backward, still talking about seniors and younger generations.　Spontaneous province.

bèi
вм. 辈
Radicals: 非, 車  (criminal, car)
Meaning Mnemonic
The criminal that stole your car was your comrade! You thought the two of you were friends, but you were probably wrong.
Just because someone is your comrade doesn't mean they actually like you. Don't let your guard down and let them near your car.
Reading Mnemonic
You feel really weird about this whole situation so you write your comrade a haiku (はい). It's really all you can do, since your car is long gone.
Comrade, what the heck
I want to get my car back
I thought we were friends.

車 (автомобиль), 非 (не)
